abstract: Tigers outfielder Delmon Young and designated hitter Victor Martinez are going to try to play in Game 4, despite muscle strains.
snippet: Tigers outfielder Delmon Young and designated hitter Victor Martinez are going to try to play in Game 4, despite muscle strains.
lead_paragraph: 4:13 p.m. | Updated Rain has delayed the start of Game 4 between the Tigers and the Rangers. First pitch is now expected to be at 5:15 p.m.

headline.main: Young and Martinez Back in Tigers' Lineup
